languages.text: "Нет, ведь голова его все еще на плечах. Но моя стая наслышана о его силе и сотворенных им мерзостях. Следы его паскудных злодеяний пятнают Простор, словно отпечатки медведя — свежий снег. Мы давно выслеживали его и искали возможности сразить, но презренный трус слишком умело хоронился за спинами своих подручных еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, ведь голова его все еще на плечах. Но моя стая наслышана о его силе и сотворенных им мерзостях. Следы его паскудных злодеяний пятнают Простор, словно отпечатки снежного вирма. Мы давно выслеживали его и искали возможности сразить, но презренный трус слишком умело хоронился за спинами своих подручных еретиков".
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."
languages.original_text: "Нет, ведь голова его все еще на плечах. Но моя стая наслышана о его силе и сотворенных им мерзостях. Следы его паскудных злодеяний пятнают Простор, словно отпечатки медведя — свежий снег. Мы давно выслеживали его и искали возможности сразить, но презренный трус слишком умело хоронился за спинами своих подручных еретиков".

We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

languages.text: “没有，否则他的脑袋早就搬家了。不过，我的狼群听说过很多关于他的事情，关于他强大的力量与亵渎的行径。整个科罗努斯扩区到处都能看到他作恶留下的痕迹，就像熊在雪地上留下的脚印一样。我们早就盯上了他，打算找机会咬断他的喉咙，可那个懦夫总是躲在异端走狗后面。”
languages.original_text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

traits.locale_text: “没有，否则他的脑袋就不会还挂在脖子上了。不过，我的狼群听说过很多关于他的事情，关于他强大的力量与亵渎的行径。整个科罗努斯扩区到处都能看到他作恶留下的痕迹，就像熊在雪地上留下的脚印一样。我们早就盯上了他，打算找机会咬断他的喉咙，可那个懦夫总是躲在异端走狗后面。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Non, sinon sa tête ne serait plus accrochée à son cou. Mais ma meute a beaucoup entendu parler de sa puissance et de ses exactions ignobles. Il a laissé sa trace malveillante dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus comme un ours marchant dans la neige fraîchement tombée. Nous l'avons traqué et avons guetté une occasion de refermer nos mâchoires sur sa gorge, mais ce lâche est doué pour se cacher derrière ses laquais hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

traits.locale_text: « Non, sinon sa tête ne serait plus accrochée à son cou. Mais ma meute a beaucoup entendu parler de sa puissance et de ses exactions ignobles. Il a laissé sa trace malveillante dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus comme un ours marchant dans la neige fraîchement tombée. Nous l'avons traqué et avons guetté une occasion de refermer nos mâchoires sur sa gorge, mais ce lâche est doué pour se cacher derrière ses laquais hérétiques. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「いいや、出会っていればその場で奴を殺していたはずだ。だが俺の群れは奴の強さや不名誉な悪行について散々聞いてきた。新雪の上の熊の足跡のように、コロヌス・エクスパンスの至る所で奴の悪行の証拠を見ることができる。奴をつけまわして首を搔っ切る機会をうかがったが、あの卑怯者は異端の下僕たちの後ろでこそこそするばかりだ」
languages.original_text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや、出会っていればその場で奴を殺していたはずだ。だが俺の群れは奴の強さや不名誉な悪行について散々聞いてきた。新雪の上の熊の足跡のように、コロヌス・エクスパンスの至る所で奴の悪行の証拠を見ることができる。奴をつけまわして首を搔っ切る機会をうかがったが、あの卑怯者は異端の下僕たちの後ろでこそこそするばかりだ」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «No, por eso sigue teniendo la cabeza sobre los hombros. Pero mi jauría ha oído hablar de sus atrocidades y de su poder. Sus crímenes dejan en la Extensión de Koronus huellas tan claras como un oso en la nieve. Lo hemos perseguido, buscando el momento de hincar nuestras fauces en su garganta, pero el muy cobarde sabe esconderse tras las huestes de lacayos herejes».
languages.original_text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

traits.locale_text: «No, por eso sigue teniendo la cabeza sobre los hombros. Pero mi jauría ha oído hablar de sus atrocidades y de su poder. Sus crímenes dejan en la Extensión de Koronus huellas tan claras como un oso en la nieve. Lo hemos perseguido, buscando el momento de hincar nuestras fauces en su garganta, pero el muy cobarde sabe esconderse tras las huestes de lacayos herejes».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Nein, sonst würde sein Kopf nicht mehr an seinem Hals hängen. Doch mein Rudel hat schon viel über seine Kraft und seine schändlichen Missetaten gehört. Man sieht die Beweise für seine Verbrechen in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung, wie Bärenspuren im frischen Schnee. Wir sind seiner Fährte gefolgt und haben nach einer Gelegenheit gesucht, unsere Kiefer um seine Kehle zu legen, doch der Feigling versteht es gut, sich hinter den Rücken seiner ketzerischen Lakaien zu verstecken."
languages.original_text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."

Man sieht die Beweise für seine Verbrechen in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung, wie Bärenspuren im frischen Schnee. Wir sind seiner Fährte gefolgt und haben nach einer Gelegenheit gesucht, unsere Kiefer um seine Kehle zu legen, doch der Feigling versteht es gut, sich hinter den Rücken seiner ketzerischen Lakaien zu verstecken."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Hayır. Karşılaşmış olsam kafası yerinde duruyor olmazdı. Ancak sürüm, kuvveti ve namussuz faaliyetleri hakkında birçok şey işitti. Gözü olan; Koronus Enginliği'nde cürümlerinin kanıtlarını, taze kar üzerindeki ayı izi misali görebilir. Dişlerimizi geçirip boğazını parçalama fırsatını yakalamak için izini sürdük ancak namert şerefsiz, kâfir yardakçılarının ardına saklanmayı iyi biliyor."
languages.original_text: "No, or else his head wouldn't still be attached to his neck. But my pack has heard plenty about his strength and ignominious misdoings. One can see the evidence of his malefactions all across the Koronus Expanse like bear tracks upon fresh snow. We stalked him and looked for a chance to clamp our jaws around his throat, but the craven knows well how to hide behind the backs of his heretical lackeys."
